a: Secreth Santa is a fun "secret Santa" event, allowing people to send and receive Non Fungible Tokens or "NFTs" (also known as ERC-721 tokens).

This secret Santa is queue-based, this means that every time a new present is sent, it will be received by the person who sent a present just before. If no present was sent during 3 days, the last secret Santa will be able to claim the prize.
You just need to send a present to join! Next time someone will send a present, you will receive it directly in your wallet.

q: Is it possible to send any NFT?
a: No, to avoid cheating and potential abuses, I decided to whitelist only a specific list of projects.
The prize is a collection to NFTs donated by various users and projects.

q: I want you to whitelist another project!
a: Sure, feel free to reach out on Discord.

q: Do you make money out of this?
a: No, this is a non-for-profit project! However, I will receive the first present as a compensation.

q: Is it possible to add something to the prize?
a: Of course! Anyone can add a new NFT to the prize! However, this will NOT turn you into a secret Santa (this means you will NOT get any present in return).

q: I think I have found a bug!
a: Nice catch! Feel free to share it with me on Discord or Twitter.
